name: Appectual IT Solutions
description:
Our team of mobile app design & development at Appectual understands the purpose of having magnificently devised UI/UX for your iPad,iPhone and Android applications.Our previous work and testimonials proudly merits us one of the popular mobile app companies. We have consulted, delivered & supported Android & IOS mobile solutions for major corporations and startups and continue to improve upon standards daily.
At Appectual, we are a very agile team. We can structure a continuous development relationship for an on-going amount of time or scope, and/or we can put together a fixed scope package. In both cases we like to begin with a project discovery phase, which lets us analyze your existing assets, understand your business goals and put together a high level development plan and architecture. We make genuine, extremely confident and well tested design choices so that the look, feel and user experience is simply perfect.
Key Services

Web Design & Development


Mobile App Development


Proximity Marketing Solutions (using Beacon Technology)
